mapper.sql: UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, QUANTITY, STOCKQUANTITY, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, COSTPRICE, REPAYAMT, RENTPRICE, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID
mapper.insert: insert into shgoods (UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, QUANTITY, STOCKQUANTITY, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, COSTPRICE, REPAYAMT, RENTPRICE, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID ) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update shgoods
UUID = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT = #{record.stat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUANTITY = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOCKQUANTITY = #{record.stockquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURE = #{record.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSITAMT = #{record.depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COSTPRICE = #{record.costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAYAMT = #{record.repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTPRICE = #{record.rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTER = #{record.laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDTIME = #{record.lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOREUUID = #{record.storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
${record.updateSql},

update shgoods set UUID = #{record.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAT = #{record.stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QUANTITY = #{record.quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STOCKQUANTITY = #{record.stockquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PICTURE = #{record.picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSITAMT = #{record.depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COSTPRICE = #{record.costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAYAMT = #{record.repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENTPRICE = #{record.rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTER = #{record.laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTUPDTIME = #{record.lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEMO = #{record.memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOREUUID = #{record.storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update shgoods
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT = #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOCKQUANTITY = #{stockquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSITAMT = #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAYAMT = #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTPRICE = #{rentprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTER = #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDTIME = #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from shgoods
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.sql: UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, QUANTITY, STOCKQUANTITY, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, REPAYAMT, COSTPRICE, RENTPRICE, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID
mapper.insert: insert into shgoods (UUID, CODE, NAME, TYPE, STAT, QUANTITY, STOCKQUANTITY, PICTURE, DESCRIPTION, PRICE, DEPOSITAMT, COSTPRICE, RENTPRICE, REPAYAMT, LASTER, LASTUPDTIME, MEMO, STOREUUID) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update shgoods
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAT = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STOCKQUANTITY = #{stockQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSITAMT = #{depositamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COSTPRICE = #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTPRICE = #{rentPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAYAMT = #{repayamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTER = #{laster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDTIME = #{lastupdtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOREUUID = #{storeuuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select A.UUID, A.CODE, A.NAME, A.TYPE, A.STAT, A.QUANTITY, A.STOCKQUANTITY, A.PICTURE, A.DESCRIPTION, A.PRICE, A.DEPOSITAMT, A.COSTPRICE, A.RENTPRICE, A.REPAYAMT, A.LASTER, A.LASTUPDTIME, A.MEMO, A.STOREUUID, B.UUID STOCKUUID, B.GOODSUUID, B.NO, B.STATE STOCKSTATE, B.MEMO STOCKMEMO, B.LOCKVERSION from shgoods A, SHGoodsStock B where A.UUID = B.GOODSUUID AND A.UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update shgoods
STOCKQUANTITY = STOCKQUANTITY + 1,
STOCKQUANTITY = STOCKQUANTITY - 1,
where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
